Reviews.Title: Not like they saying...
Reviews.Author: chris
Reviews.Content: I put the signs out there but it's alredy wearing off. The big ones are ok for a while, if you expose them outdoor are not going to last(craking and wearing off thr red color), however the small ones are the worst after coulpe of weeks they will fall off or peel. Not recomend it. I will get the metal ones or even plastic. No more stikers.

Reviews.Title: color faded in 2 weeks!
Reviews.Author: abusinessowner
Reviews.Content: The large video-Security warning signs work great, I wish that they were made to stick from the inside of the window instead of outside, to prevent some body come along and peel them off.  The stickers decals completely faded within 2 weeks. Not recommended!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: I felt it was not worth the money
Reviews.Author: Raghu Sakleshpur
Reviews.Content: Whatever was included in the product was as per description. However I felt that the material did not look work the money.

Reviews.Title: Very Conspicuous
Reviews.Author: Suzy Bunzl
Reviews.Content: There are four signs, two small, two large.  They're big and very conspicuous.  I ordered them for my home, but didn't use the big ones because they're so "in your face".  If you wanted something like that, for a business for example, they'd do the job.

Reviews.Title: Can't read them after 3 months
Reviews.Author: Nicholas Crawford
Reviews.Content: Con: We placed the small signs outdoors, in direct sunlight, and they are completely illegible after 3 months. The red ink cannot stand up to UV rays.Pro/Con: The adhesive still works, so I might be stuck leaving the now-blank stickers in place.

Reviews.Title: Not weather-proof, but a good value
Reviews.Author: Clifton Beasley
Reviews.Content: I was hoping the large signs would be weather-proof. Unfortunately, they're not. Still, for the price, this is a good value.

Reviews.Title: It's a sign.
Reviews.Author: Rock On
Reviews.Content: Good, simple sign.  Very prompt shipping and great price.  No defects found in item.  I was hoping the sign was a sticker that could be stuck on a window, but it is not.  In any case, the sign does the job and can be stuck on with tape or hung up.

ProductInfo.Features:
Easily posted and removed
Can be applied to any smooth surface
These signs are your first line of defense against criminals
This is the quick, easy way to warn criminals that they are being watched.
Size: 2 of 11.5x8.3 inch, 2 of 3x2 inch
ProductInfo.Name: VideoSecu 2 large (11.5x8.3") and 2 small (3x2") security warning signs stickers Decals for Home CCTV DVR CCD Video Surveillance Camera System 1RN
